objects.finish: Bright white paint with gold accents

visual_attributes.lighting: Natural light filtering through the glass doors
visual_attributes.texture: Smooth paint surface, glossy glass, polished brass handles

indian_context.space_utilization: Efficient use of vertical space with pujols arranged on shelves
indian_context.cultural_significance: The pooja room is a sacred space for Hindus where religious items and iconography are displayed for worship

ai_generated_tags.description: The image showcases a modern Indian pooja room with a sleek cabinet design featuring glass doors, allowing for a view of the neatly arranged religious icons inside. The cabinet is adorned with traditional carved wooden details and brass handles, blending modern and traditional elements. The white paint with gold accents provides a clean and elegant look, while the natural light enhances the vibrant colors of the religious items, creating a serene and sacred atmosphere.

metadata.budget_indicator: Moderate, with a focus on quality materials like brass and glass
